tool.name: Generate phonons using ASE (pm-asephonons)
tool.command:
pip3 show pymuonsuite || ( git clone https://github.com/muon-spectroscopy-computational-project/pymuon-suite /tmp/pymuon-suite && pip install /tmp/pymuon-suite && rm -rf /tmp/pymuon-suite) && touch pho_params.yaml && ([[ ! -z "$name" ]] && printf "name: $name 
">>pho_params.yaml || ( >&2 echo "name empty" && exit 2)) && ([[ ! -z "$phonon_kpoint_grid" ]] && ( printf "phonon_kpoint_grid: $phonon_kpoint_grid 
" | sed "s/__ob__/[/g" | sed "s/__cb__/]/g" )>>pho_params.yaml || ( >&2 echo "phonon_kpoint_grid empty" && exit 2)) && ([[ ! -z "$kpoint_grid" ]] && ( printf "kpoint_grid: $kpoint_grid 
" | sed "s/__ob__/[/g" | sed "s/__cb__/]/g" )>>pho_params.yaml || ( >&2 echo "kpoint_grid empty" && exit 2)) && ([[ ! -z "$force_tol" ]] && printf "force_tol: $force_tol 
">>pho_params.yaml || ( >&2 echo "force_tol empty" && exit 2)) && ([[ ! -z "$dftb_set" ]] && printf "dftb_set: $dftb_set 
">>pho_params.yaml || ( >&2 echo "dftb_set empty" && exit 2)) && ([[ ! -z "$pbc" ]] && printf "pbc: $pbc 
">>pho_params.yaml || ( >&2 echo "pbc empty" && exit 2)) && ([[ ! -z "$force_clean" ]] && printf "force_clean: $force_clean 
">>pho_params.yaml || ( >&2 echo "force_clean empty" && exit 2)) && ln -s $structure input.cell && cat pho_params.yaml && pm-asephonons input.cell pho_params.yaml && cat asephonons.out && ln -s "${name}_phonons.txt" phonon_report.txt && zip -r out_zip.zip $name "${name}_phonons.txt" asephonons.out band.out pho_params.yaml
tool.help:
usage: pm-symmetry structure
Given an input structure, generates a Wyckoff points symmetry report for that structure.
